languages.text: While Marazhai is {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, every kill he makes grants him a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.
languages.original_text: Пока на Маражая действует {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g}, каждое совершаемое им убийство дает ему суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g} +5.

traits.locale_text: While Marazhai is bleeding, every kill he makes grants him a stacking +5 bonus to Weapon and Ballistic Skill.

While Marazhai is {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, every kill he makes grants him a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

While Marazhai is {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, every kill he makes grants him a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

languages.text: Mientras Marazhai sufre {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}, cada muerte que inflija le proporciona una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} +5 acumulativa a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}.
languages.original_text: While Marazhai is {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, every kill he makes grants him a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Mientras Marazhai sufre {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}, cada muerte que inflija le proporciona una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} +5 acumulativa a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} y de armas.

languages.text: 当玛拉斋处于{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}状态时，每击杀一名敌人，{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}就会提高5点，此效果可叠加。
languages.original_text: While Marazhai is {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, every kill he makes grants him a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当玛拉斋处于{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}状态时，每击杀一名敌人，武器技能与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}就会提高5点，此效果可叠加。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}

languages.text: Tant que Marazhai subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, chaque ennemi qu'il élimine applique un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} cumulatif de +5 à sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et à sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g}.
languages.original_text: While Marazhai is {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, every kill he makes grants him a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Tant que Marazhai subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, chaque ennemi qu'il élimine applique un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} cumulatif de +5 à sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et à sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g}.

languages.text: Ist Marazhai mit {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} belegt, gewährt ihm jeder Kill zusätzlich +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Während Marazhai {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}blutet{/g} gewährt ihm jeder Kill zusätzlich +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf Waffen- und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g}.

languages.text: マラズハイが{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}している間、殺害するたびに{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}に+5の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}が累積される。
